divs: Sighting Detailshi,again,i was taking random pics of the sky.(do you know,you will see some type of anomoly in every 6-10 pics.),i think these things are EVERYWHERE!.they seem to be cloaked untill you go through the process of filming,or videotaping,so that alot of the time,cannot be seen with the naked eye..so i decided they are too frequent to report.,everytime.,unless it is a (fantastic) sighting.,which this one threw me for a loop. i am certain my 55 year old heart feels there is something incredible about to happen.i really didn't believe up untill a year ago,when i had my first sighting.,and many,many since then.THANK YOU.,& KEEP YOUR EYES TO THE SKIES!!!!!
Summary: At first it looked like the very tip of a phillips screwdriver.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Butte
